title: AR69003: Planning Workshop - Quick Facts

Previous Year Grade Distribution

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Skill formation Community Planning exercises. Orientation workshop through reference studies and introductory graphic course. Identification of needs of a community through socio-economic and physical survey- including updating a given base map. Site planning, Housing cluster and residential sector studies layout, density, utility network and community facilities locations cost benefit thereof. Introduction to special area problems (slum/new towns/rural area) and preparation of their plan program. Land use interaction studies of a small urban area and its environment.
